function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Access to mental health services, support networks, mindfulness and stress-reduction techniques","category":"Quarantine support ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide mental health support and interventions to address anxiety and related issues.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Explore reasons for skewness and kurtosis, consider alternative statistical methods, and interpret findings with caution.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to validate the correlation and consider multiple factors that contribute to anxiety","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Explore other potential causes of general anxiety and identify its drivers","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consider the influence of anxiety factors on vacation behavior in the analysis and develop tailored interventions","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement flexible travel policies, monitor and adapt to changing travel patterns, prioritize outdoor and socially distanced activities","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide accurate information on covid-19 risks and safety measures, offer information on safety measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote responsible travel behavior, emphasize safety guidelines, provide resources for safe awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing behavior-specific approaches, addressing risk perception and anxiety, providing support for affected individuals","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduce behavior-specific travel anxiety through behavior-specific strategies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement non-residential processes in disease transmission models, refine the representation of local and remote environmental conditions, and validate the model outputs with real-world data.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"}]}
